translations: v．重新调整，重新排列：改变某物的位置、方向或关系，使之更合适或更有效。
· The company realigns its strategy to adapt to the changing market.
公司重新调整其战略以适应不断变化的市场。

sentences.sentence: In this period, She shakes Herself out and realigns many of Her aspects.
sentences.translation: 在这段时期中，她摇动她自己而且重新校正她的许多方面。

sentences.sentence: Tapping on the compass in the upper right-hand corner of the screen realigns you northward.
sentences.translation: 攻丝的罗盘在右上角的屏幕重新调整你北上。

sentences.sentence: In Windows 7, you can select multiple drives for defragmenting, which realigns small file fragments into larger contiguous blocks.
sentences.translation: 在Windows 7系统中，你可以选择多个驱动器进行碎片整理，将小的文件碎片重新编排成更大的连续段。
